title: providing
name: equal to %E2%80%9CB%E2%80%9D.
definition:
Required when the JPR field is populated. 
Otherwise prohibited.
validEntries: 2 nd  Character (4-Step Process)  Service Request%3A   Entered  by%3A  Step 1 %E2%80%93 Service Request  A = Manual/mechanized  Customer  F = Verbal  Provider  G  = Access Service Request follow up to verbal  Customer  Step 2 %E2%80%93 Service Request Confirmation  B = Manual/mechanized  Provider  Step 3A %E2%80%93 Firm Order %E2%80%93 Service Request Sent (Same PON)  C = Manual/mechanized  Customer  H = Verbal  Provider  J  = Access Service Request follow up to verbal  Customer  Step 3B %E2%80%93 Firm Order %E2%80%93 Service Request Not Sent  D = Manual/mechanized  Customer  J  = Access Service Request follow up to verbal  K = Verbal  Provider  Step 4 %E2%80%93 Firm Order Confirmation (FOC)  E = Manual/mechanized  Provider
validEntryNotes: Valid IAC codes are maintained by  Telcordi a  Technologies.
fieldNotes: The above example indicates that the ACNA and CCNA are the same.   A B  C  X Y Z
The above example indicates that the ACNA and CCNA are different.
usageNotes:
Required when the ACTL field does not identify the specific physical termination point of the access service. 
Prohibited when the ACT field is "D". 
Otherwise optional.
